name: Next Market
description: Platform for connecting market hosts and vendors
bullets: Frontend: Next.js (TypeScript) + SSR, TailwindCSS, Formik (Form handling)
Backend: Supabase Edge function, Next API Routes, Supabase (AUTH + DB)
CI/CD: GitHub Actions to Vercel Deployment

name: Stella
bullets: Frontend: React Native + Expo, Zustand (State Management), Expo Components (Camera, Image Picker, etc)
Backend: Supabase Edge functions + Postgres functions, Supabase (AUTH + DB), Postgres Vector Plugin, OpenAI + Gemini
Services: Data scraping with Playwright from H&M, Zara, etc.
